content: Are there any CDS FHIR test server where I can test a CDS services and how it works ?
Long time no see my friend! Try reading this : http://cds-hooks.org/

Thanks. I saw it and this is why I was interested in try a server. This is a demo. I canÂ´t perform operations with this server. I would like to find a server to perform operations like https://example.com/cds-services etc... On this server... http://hooks.fhir.me:8082/cds-services there are just demos.
FYI - we have a stream dedicated to cds-hooks here. It'd be great to continue this discussion over there.
Hello everyone, I'm working on CSD hooks for appointment booking. how can I test it with Cerner or Epic?
Best to ask on #cds hooks
